import React from "react"; import {Container, Row, Col, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function YerevanStateMedicalUniversityArmenia() { const meta = { title: "Yerevan State Medical University in Armenia for Indian Students", description: "Yerevan State Medical University in Armenia for Indian Students at MCI Approved. ✓Eligibility Criteria ✓Admission Procedure ✓Fee Structure ✓Facilities", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/yerevan-state-medical-university-in-armenia", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Yerevan State Medical University in Armenia for Indian Students" } } }; return (

Yerevan State Medical University in Armenia for Indian Students

  • About Yerevan State Medical University
  • Indian Student Admission Procedure
  • {" "} Eligibility Criteria of Yerevan State Medical University
  • {" "} Requirements for MBBS Admission
  • Yerevan State Medical University Fee Structure
  • Yerevan State Medical University Facility
  • Yerevan State Medical University Advantages for Indian Student
  • New-Lyf Education Authorized Indian Partner
{/* */}

About Yerevan State Medical University

Yerevan State Medical University is one of the top{" "} Armenia medical university {" "} that was established in 1920. It has trained thousands of doctors. It has highly qualified and experienced professors. This{" "} university is recognized by the MCI & WHO . The mode of instruction is English is this college. The MBBS course duration is six years including 1 year of internship.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take admission in the best Armenia medical university:

  • {" "} The students need to fill in the application form appropriately & attach the necessary documents
  • {" "} Once their application is accepted, they will receive a provisional admission letter.
  • {" "} When their visa invitation will be ready, the university will mail their visa invitation.
  • {" "} After that, they need to stamp their visa in the Embassy.

Eligibility Criteria of Yerevan State Medical University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to{" "} study MBBS in Armenia medical college {" "} are as follows:

  • {" "} The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • {" "} The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission in the best Armenia medical university.
  • {" "} The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for taking admission to{" "} Armenia medical college.
  • {" "} The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS Admission

The necessary documents for taking admission to{" "} Armenia medical college are the following:

  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees.
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential
Yerevan State Medical University Fee Structure
Particular 1st Year 2nd Year 3rd Year 4th Year 5th Year 6th Year
Tuition Fee in $ (approx.) 5,000 5,000 5,000 5,000 5,000 5,000
Fees in Indian Rupees (approx.) 4.62 Lakhs 3.92 Lakhs 3.92 Lakhs 3.92 Lakhs 3.92 Lakhs 3.92 Lakhs
Yerevan State Medical University Facility

Yerevan State Medical University provides the following facilities:

  • {" "} The Infrastructure of{" "} Yerevan State Medical University consists of laboratories and education equipment
  • {" "} The environment of the Yerevan State Medical University campus is safe and calm.
  • {" "} All essential facilities are provided to the students such as Indian food, accommodation, and wifi, & more.
Yerevan State Medical University Advantages for Indian Student

Yerevan State Medical University provides the following advantages to the Indian students:

  • {" "} There is no requirement to pay any donation or capitation fee for taking admission in Armenia medical college.
  • {" "} The cost of living in Armenia is reasonable and the tuition fees are also affordable.
  • {" "} There is no requirement to appear for any type of entrance test for taking admission in Armenia medical college.
  • {" "} It provides high-quality of medical education to the students at a lower price.
  • {" "} The language of education in Armenia medical university{" "} is English.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf education is the authorized Indian partner with the{" "} best Armenia medical university . We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Armenia for pursuing MBBS course in Yerevan State Medical University that taught MBBS course in English language. We have an expert team of consultants that provide well-researched assistance & comprehensive counseling to the students. We provide complete information about Yerevan State Medical University and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study MBBS in Armenia medical university and fulfill their wish.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements
